website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak EasyShare V1073 is the best example we've seen for trying a camera before buying it online. Smouldering urban looks and rock-solid build quality aside, this Kodak is pain to use and delivers only average images. HD-style movies are better, but watch out for a sting in the tail -- that £70 HDTV dock

customer_reviews.title: Black and wavy lines only thing visible in pictures.
customer_reviews.text: The camera was broken immediately upon receipt. The moment I turned it on it made a continuous sound like a broken tv. When I looked through the viewfinder to take a picture, all that was visible was blackness and wavy lines. The camera did not function at all. I turned the camera off and then back on to see if that would help and it read that it overheated and then shut down automatically. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Osterberg

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was an excellent camera when I got it!! My first touch screen!
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra Oxendine

customer_reviews.title: Huge Screen
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. She had a larger Kodak camera but wanted a smaller one with larger screen. This has a touch screen too that makes it so simple. Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Sleek!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is one of it's kind. I was scared when I first read the reviews but all that is gone now as I am enjoying the camera. It makes me stand out wherever I go. The earlier reviews, about the battery cover flipping open occasionally, is one giant lie. The battery lid slides neatly in. The touch screen is another fantastic quality it has. It makes it look more like a mini computer than a camera! An almost buttonless wizard! Men, you cant believe the level this camera can give you, when you go to an occasion and as other people bring out their "camera", you bring out this "near buttonless wizard!"
customer_reviews.author: Noms Services Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality, no bueno
customer_reviews.text: I have Nikon dslr camera, very heavy and expensive, not for everyday use who likes to take pictures a lot, so I wanted something easy and simple after my Samsung exhibit phone lost its mind, which used to take great pictures. I read some of the reviews, and some said picture quality is good. So, I bought the camera but if you have taken picture with iphone or Samsung galaxy or Samsung exhibit, this camera is nowhere close to the picture quality of the above mentioned ones. And currently I use blackberry Torch, picture clarity of even torch is better than this camera, not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera for great pictures in a pocket sized camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare V1073 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! It was so easy to use right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Pugchick

customer_reviews.title: 7 Years and Stil Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: Have used this camera for the past 7 years and it is still working great. Takes excellent pictures and video. It has been used on many trips and cruises. Tried buying newer ones but they do not compare. When it finally gives-up I will probably spend the money to buy a Canon SLR. Photos were taken on a New England/Canada Cruise - Sept. 2016
customer_reviews.author: Glorym

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. The picture quality is more than i'll ever need. The camera feels good in your hands and has a good simple design. I love the touch screen and so does everyone that sees it. I've only have two minor complaints. The screen can be a little dark in bright light but I've still been able to see enough to take a good picture. The other complaint is that sometimes the touchscreen can have a mind of it's own, but this is very minor and once you get the hang of it, it's not a problem at all. I promise if you buy this camera you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one year
customer_reviews.text: We had this camera for one year. It worked great for the most part. Then we noticed it started to slow down. The time it took between taking one picture and then being ready to take the next took longer and longer. Then the zoom out function stopped working, so you could zoom in but you would have to shut the camera down and restart it to reset the zoom. A month after that it stopped working completely. It would turn on, the lens would come out make a few clicks then go back in and shut off. Completely useless now. I don't recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sean G. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera...Don't Buy From Beach Camera Though
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool camera with a lot of great features. The touch screen is very cool and easy to use. Pictures look great and are very easy to manipulate. There are several different styles and what not available to use, so you honestly have a very professional camera for a great value. Kodak is a great company and you can know that you will get a good product. Caution though. Don't buy from Beach Camera as they sold me a defective camera and left me in the lurch. Once I went up the chain of command at Kodak, they quickly replaced the camera and I couldn't be happier. Craig Charleston, SC
customer_reviews.author: C. Delk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and comparable to pro quality!
customer_reviews.text: Kodak has always create the best on the scale of quality v affordability. This camera is no exception. The pictures are extremely crisp and sharp, the videos are HD (720p). If you are a everyday camera enthusiast, this is the camera for you. At under $200, it is very affordable with easily the same results as a $500 Canon or Nikon. The touchscreen works well but is sometimes hard to see in direct sunlight. The camera self-adapts its modes and works well in any environment. 10MP is more than enough for me and just using this camera, you can take pro quality pics with a consumer price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Girouard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best camera I've owned, and I've owned a few. I read the cons in other reviews, but at the end of the day I wanted great vacation pictures that I could take without a lot of hassle. This is definitely a point-and-shoot and yet can also be tailored for other special shots.
customer_reviews.author: timsloane

customer_reviews.title: HD Video "clicks" with bright flash while recording
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly for its HD recording. While the resolution is nice, the HD recording "blinks" with a flash of bright light every 5 seconds or so. This is unacceptable for a finished product. Kodak should not release beta-test quality hardware to the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: after a year using this camera, it breaks. it also would not charge. the picture quality is not so great either, especially when it's 10mp. i have used over cameras that are cheaper and it is far better than this camera.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best camera i have/will ever own
customer_reviews.text: This by far has been the best camera i ever owned! i get a new camera every year, and nothing has compared to this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare V1073 10 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Image Stabilized Zoom
feature_bullets: 10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 30 x 40 inches
3x Schneider-Kreuznach Variogon optical image-stabilized zoom lens; HD still capture and HD video
3.0-inch touch-screen color LCD; in-camera charging using the included Li-Ion rechargeable battery
Innovative smart capture feature automatically adjusts settings for a great picture in just about any environment
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
